# Project 04: Data Operators

Test all operators and data transformation capabilities.

## Purpose
Test every data operator:
- json_transform: Object/array transformations
- filter: Array filtering
- http_request: External API calls
- schema_validate: JSON schema validation
- variable_set: Pipeline state management
- logger: Debug logging

## Time Required
~1 hour

## Operators Covered

### 4.1 json_transform
- Field mapping and renaming
- Nested path extraction
- Array transformations
- JMESPath expressions

### 4.2 filter
- Equality, comparison, contains
- AND/OR/NOT conditions
- Edge cases (empty, null)

### 4.3 http_request
- GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
- Headers and auth
- Error handling

### 4.4 schema_validate
- Type validation
- Required fields
- Pattern/enum validation

### 4.5 variable_set
- Set and retrieve variables
- Variable scoping
- Type handling

### 4.6 logger
- Log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR)
- Context data
